description:
A good set of Allen wrenches is a must for bike maintenance and tune ups, this compact set has all the sizes you’ll need.

  • Includes: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 8mm Allen keys
  • Contoured tips for those hard to reach screws
  • Built from hardened steel
  • Plastic holder keeps things organized
name: MEC 7-Piece Allen Key Set
